aim.aim_description: To make the customer aware that they may not have the latest information available when betting on live events, and that they may be at a disadvantage to operators or other customers who have more up-to-date information

requirements.title: Information About Broadcast Delays
requirements.full_text: Information must be made available that explains that 'live' TV or other broadcasts are delayed and that others may have more up-to-date information. Main in-play betting pages must include this information where practicable.

implementation_guidance.full_text: Brief information should be included on main in-play pages or screens, such as the in-play home page or screen. More detail should be provided in 'help' or 'how to' or other product pages or screens. For telephone betting the information should be included in the general betting or product information that is made available to and/or sent out to customers. Where a brief notice cannot be practicably included on the main pages or screens, the information should be provided on easily accessible 'help', 'how to' or other product pages or screens.
key_points: Must explain that live TV/broadcasts are delayed
Must explain that others may have more up-to-date information
Main in-play betting pages must include this information where practicable
Brief information on main in-play pages/screens
More detail in help/how to pages
Telephone betting: include in general betting information
If not practicable on main pages, provide on easily accessible help pages
content_requirements: Explain that live TV or other broadcasts are delayed
Explain that others may have more up-to-date information

primary.location: Main in-play pages or screens (e.g., in-play home page)

secondary.location: Help, how to, or other product pages

telephone_betting.distribution: Made available to and/or sent out to customers

fallback.condition: Where brief notice cannot practicably be included on main pages
fallback.location: Easily accessible help, how to, or other product pages/screens

requirements.citation: UK Gambling Commission - Remote Technical Standards, RTS Requirement 15A

compliance_notes.overall_purpose: Ensure customers aware of information disadvantage when betting on live events with delayed broadcasts
compliance_notes.enforcement_priority: Medium-High - important for fair betting on live events

compliant_notices: Live TV broadcasts are delayed. Others may have more current information.
Please note: Streamed events have a delay. You may be at an information disadvantage.
Live feeds are subject to delay. Other customers may have access to faster information sources.

document_metadata.source: UK Gambling Commission - Remote Technical Standards
